organizations: TravelCenters of America Acquires Additional Convenience Stores

thread.title: CORRECTING and REPLACING TravelCenters of America Acquires Additional Convenience Stores in Missouri and Kansas
thread.title_full: CORRECTING and REPLACING TravelCenters of America Acquires Additional Convenience Stores in Missouri and Kansas

title: CORRECTING and REPLACING TravelCenters of America Acquires Additional Convenience Stores in Missouri and Kansas
text:
CORRECTING and REPLACING TravelCenters of America Acquires Additional Convenience Stores in Missouri and Kansas CORRECTION...by TravelCenters of America LLC September 29, 2015 12:52 PM Eastern Daylight Time WESTLAKE, Ohio- Please replace the release with the following corrected version due to multiple revisions. 
The corrected release reads: TRAVELCENTERS OF AMERICA ACQUIRES ADDITIONAL CONVENIENCE STORES IN MISSOURI AND KANSAS 
TravelCenters of America LLC (TravelCenters), announced it has completed its previously disclosed acquisitions of convenience stores located throughout Missouri and Kansas: 36 stores were acquired today. TravelCenters has begun to operate all of the acquired stores. TravelCenters expects these 36 convenience stores will be rebranded as Minit Mart convenience stores and the sites will undergo improvements in the coming months. 
About TravelCenters of America LLC 
TravelCenters of America LLC (TravelCenters) is headquartered in Westlake, Ohio and is located in 43 states and Canada operating under the Minit Mart®, TA® and Petro Stopping Centers® brands. Its business includes 406 convenience stores, including 256 which are located at travel centers. For more information on TravelCenters, TA, and Petro Stopping Centers, please visit www.ta-petro.com . For more information on Minit Mart, please visit www.minitmart.com . Contacts
